1COR 5.9 gamelida izwis ana þizai aipistaulein:
ni blandaiþ izwis horam,
1COR 5.10 ni þaim horam þis fairƕaus, aiþþau þaim faihufrikam jah wilwam aiþþau galiugam skalkinondam, unte skuldedeiþ þan us þamma fairƕau usgaggan.

1COR 5.11 iþ nu gamelida izwis ni blandan, jabai ƕas broþar namnids sijai hors aiþþau faihufriks aiþþau galiugam skalkinonds aiþþau ubilwaurds aiþþau afdrugkja aiþþau wilwa, þamma swaleikamma ni miþmatjan.
1COR 5.12 ƕa mik jah þans uta stojan?
niu þans inna jus stojiþ?
1COR 5.13 iþ þans uta guþ stojiþ.
usnimiþ þana ubilan us izwis silbam.
1COR 6.1 Gadars ƕas izwara, wiþra anþarana staua habands stojan fram inwindaim jah ni fram...
...1COR 7.5 izwara misso, niba þau us gaqissai ƕo ƕeilo, ei uhteigai sijaiþ fastan jah bidan;
þaþroþþan samaþ gawandjaiþ, ei ni fraisai izwara Satana in ungahobainais izwaraizos.
1COR 7.6 þat-uþ-þan qiþa gakunnands, ni bi haitjai.
1COR 7.7 iþ wiljau allans mans wisan swe mik silban;
akei ƕarjizuh swesa giba habaiþ fram guda, sums swa, sumsuh swa.
1COR 7.8 aþþan qiþa þaim unqenidam jah widuwom:
goþ ist im, jabai sind swe ik.
1COR 7.9 iþ jabai ni gahabaina sik, liugandau;
batizo ist auk liugan þau intundnan.

1COR 7.10 iþ þaim liugom haftam anabiuda, ni ik, ak frauja, qenai fairra abin ni skaidan. 1COR 7.11 iþ jabai gaskaidnai, wisan unliugaida, aiþþau du abin seinamma aftra gagawairþjan, jah aban qen ni fraletan.
1COR 7.12 iþ þaim anþaraim ik qiþa, ni frauja:
jabai ƕas broþar qen aigi ungalaubjandein, jah so gawilja ist bauan miþ imma, ni afletai þo qen;
1COR 7.13 jah qens soei aigi aban ungalaubjandan, jah sa gawilja ist bauan miþ izai, ni afletai þana aban.
1COR 7.14 weihaida ist qens so ungalaubjandei in abin, jah gaweihaids ist aba sa ungalaubjands in qenai;
aiþþau barna izwara unhrainja weseina, iþ nu weiha sind.
1COR 7.15 iþ jabai sa ungalaubjands skaidiþ sik, skaidai;
nist gaþiwaids broþar aiþþau swistar in þaim swaleikaim;
aþþan in gawairþja laþoda uns guþ.
1COR 7.16 ƕa nukkannt þu, qino, ei aban ganasjais?
aiþþau ƕa kannt, guma, þatei qen þeina ganasjais?
1COR 7.17 ni ei, ƕarjammeh swaswe gadailida guþ, ainƕarjatoh swaswe galaþoda guþ, swa gaggai;
jah swa in allaim aikklesjom anabiuda.
1COR 7.18 bimaitans galaþoda warþ ƕas,
ni ufrakjai;
miþ faurafillja galaþoþs warþ ƕas,
ni bimaitai.
1COR 7.19 þata bimait ni waihts ist jah þata faurafilli ni waihts ist, ak fastubnja anabusne gudis.
1COR 7.20 ƕarjizuh in laþonai þizaiei laþoþs was, in þizai sijai.
1COR 7.21 skalks galaþoþs wast,
ni karos;
akei þauhjabai magt freis wairþan, mais brukei.
1COR 7.22 saei auk in fraujin haitans ist skalks, fralets fraujins ist;
samaleiko saei freis haitada, skalks ist Xristaus.
1COR 7.23 wairþa galaubamma usbauhtai sijuþ;
ni wairþaiþ skalkos mannam.
1COR 7.24 ƕarjizuh in þammei atlaþoþs was, broþrjus, in þamma gastandai at guda.
1COR 7.25 aþþan bi maujos anabusn fraujins ni haba;
iþ ragin giba swe gaarmaiþs fram fraujin du triggws wisan.
1COR 7.26 man nu þata goþ wisan in þizos andwairþons þaurftais, þatei goþ ist mann swa wisan:
1COR 7.27 gabundans is qenai,
ni sokei lausjan;
galausiþs is qenai,
ni sokei qen.
1COR 7.28 aþþan jabai nimis qen, ni frawaurhtes, jah jabai liugada mawi, ni frawaurhta, iþ aglon leikis gastaldand þo swaleika.
iþ ik izwis freidja...
...1COR 8.9 wairþai þaim unmahteigam.
1COR 8.10 jabai auk ƕas gasaiƕiþ þuk þana habandan kunþi in galiuge stada anakumbjandan, niu miþwissei is siukis wisandins timrjada du galiugagudam gasaliþ matjan?
1COR 8.11 fraqistniþ auk sa unmahteiga ana þeinamma witubnja broþar in þize Xristus gaswalt.
